@aabmass I think we have  some options:

1. Fix lint separately in another PR (https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python/pull/4209)
2. Assign all top-level globals explicitly in the generated code (will require manually or automated adding)
3. Skip the lint 😓

discussion_comments.comment_body: I'm not too familiar with jinja. What does this change do?

The issue here is that when we comment a variable as in `# MYVARIABLE: Final = 42` then pylint will warn that the following multiline comment (`""" Deprecated: ... """`) is not used. To avoid that we are adding any eventual following comment added to the variable as inline comment (`# Deprecated: ...`) so pylint is happy
